mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (ID, CODE, NAME, PASSWORD, REGION_ID, DUTY_ID, LOGIN_NUM, DEPARTMENT_ID, DESCRIPTION, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, MODIFIER_ID, MODIFY_DATE, VERSION, CONTACT_TELEPHONE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dutyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loginNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contactTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_sys_user set CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DUTY_ID = #{dutyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOGIN_NUM = #{loginNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTACT_TELEPHONE = #{contactTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, CODE, NAME, PASSWORD, REGION_ID, DUTY_ID, LOGIN_NUM, DEPARTMENT_ID, DESCRIPTION, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, MODIFIER_ID, MODIFY_DATE, VERSION, CONTACT_TELEPHONE from t_sys_user where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ID, CODE, NAME, PASSWORD, REGION_ID, DUTY_ID, LOGIN_NUM, DEPARTMENT_ID, DESCRIPTION, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, MODIFIER_ID, MODIFY_DATE, VERSION, CONTACT_TELEPHONE from t_sys_user
